allSaves.value: +3 status to all saves vs. transmutation

description.value: These blades come in a variety of shapes and styles, but they are typically 2 feet long.

A mix of digestive juices and green dragon poison glands nauseates the victim as its flesh is digested from within.

Activate A Interact (Contact)

Saving Throw DC 37 Fortitude

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 6d6#poison]] poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened} 2 (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 7d6#poison]] poison damage and sickened 3 (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 9d6#poison]] poison damage and sickened 4 (1 round)

rules.text: Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 4 # acid splash damage]] and [[/r 4d6 #persistent acid damage]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}
Effect: On hit, -20-foot penalty to Speeds. On critical hit, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Immobilized]{Immobilized} for 1 round.
Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 4 # electricity splash damage]] and the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the start of your next turn.
Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 4 # cold splash damage]] and the target takes a –15-foot penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

Effect: The bomb deals [[/r 4 # sonic splash damage]]{4 sonic splash damage}. All creatures within 10 feet must succeed at a Fortitude save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Deafened]{Deafened} for 1 round.

description.value:
Blue Viper carries the following infused items:

3 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Acid Flask (Major)]{Acid Flask (Major)}

5 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Black Lotus Extract]{Black Lotus Extract}

3 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Bottled Lightning (Major)]{Bottled Lightning (Major)}

4 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Elixir of Life (True)]{Elixir of Life (True)}

3 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Frost Vial (Major)]{Frost Vial (Major)}

2 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Mindfog Mist]{Mindfog Mist}

3 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Oblivion Essence]{Oblivion Essence}

3 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Tanglefoot Bag (Major)]{Tanglefoot Bag (Major)}

5 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Tears of Death]{Tears of Death}

2 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Thunderstone (Major)]{Thunderstone (Major)}

These items last for 24 hours, or until the next time Blue Viper makes his daily preparations.
The monster can see in dim light as though it were bright light, so it ignores the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} condition due to dim light.

Trigger A creature adjacent to Blue Viper hits him with a melee unarmed Strike.

Effect The triggering creature is exposed to @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Dragon Bile]{Dragon Bile}. This consumes the poison, and Blue Viper can't use Poisoned Coat again until he spends 10 minutes applying one dose of contact or injury poison to his clothing.

items.name: +3 status to all saves vs. transmutation

description.value: Blue Viper's infused poisons have a DC of 47.
Blue Viper Interacts to draw an injury poison and applies it to a weapon he is holding.

When Blue Viper successfully Strikes a flat-footed creature with a poisoned weapon or exposes a flat-footed creature to an inhaled poison, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to its initial save against that poison.

Requirements Blue Viper is holding a contact or injury poison.

Effect Blue Viper swigs the poison and sprays it out of his mouth, affecting a 15-foot cone. Blue Viper isn’t exposed to the poison. All creatures in the cone are immediately exposed to the poison and each creature must attempt a Fortitude save against the poison.

Blue Viper Interacts to draw an inhaled poison, deploys the poison in a smoke cloud that provides concealment in a 5-foot emanation, then Sneaks up to his Speed. He is not exposed to the inhaled poison.

Frequency once per round;

Effect Blue Viper accelerates the flow of time so his poisons run their course faster. He Interacts to draw a contact poison and throws it in the air, where it showers down in a 20-foot burst within 60 feet. All creatures in the burst are automatically exposed to the poison, bypassing any onset time, and each creature must attempt a saving throw against that poison. If a creature fails, the duration of any beneficial spells or effects affecting the creature are reduced by 3 rounds (or by 6 rounds on a critical failure).
Blue Viper Interacts to draw a bomb, then Strikes with it.
